note:
Bad at intros, but let me try.
I’m Parpi. Not a kid anymore, been in the computer field since the nineties. Used to be a developer for many many years. Then, by accident, got interested in Linux (Mandrake Linux back then… gosh lol) and eventually moved to a RHEL SysAdmin role. Fast forward several years and I was talked into management, which I do to this day.
I really would like to use my experience to add a bit to the open source community.
I like photography and travelling. Living in Portugal
